net.gliblybits.bitsengine.render

Class BitsOpenGLRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • GLSurfaceView
      • net.gliblybits.bitsengine.render.BitsOpenGLRenderer

  • public class BitsOpenGLRenderer
extends GLSurfaceView
    The BitsOpenGLRenderer class is the render thread.
    It (re)creates the opengl es surface, configures the opengl es system and
    renders the available render queues of the game-/logic-thread.

    Since:
    0.1 - Streak
    Version:
    0.1 - Streak
    Author:
    Marc Wiedenhoeft - GliblyBits

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BitsOpenGLRenderer()
      Constructor sets the BitsGame reference and the current renderer of the surface.

      Defines if the renderer may inform the game-/logic-thread,
      if the surface ready or the last render cycle is done.
